title: QuarkusDev fails to start when using a Gradle convention plugin
body:
### Describe the bug

Using **Quarkus 2.3.0.CR1** and **Gradle 7.2** on **Java 11** on **Windows 10**, when using a quarkus convention plugin in `buildSrc` (for the purpose of [sharing build logic between subprojects](https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/sharing_build_logic_between_subprojects.html)), running
`.\gradlew --stacktrace quarkusDev`
will result in the following stacktrace
```
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':quarkusDev'.
        ....
Caused by: org.gradle.api.GradleException: Failed to run
        at io.quarkus.gradle.tasks.QuarkusDev.startDev(QuarkusDev.java:211)
        ....
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unable to find quarkus-gradle-plugin dependency in root project 'failed-dev-mode'
        at io.quarkus.gradle.tasks.QuarkusDev.addGradlePluginDeps(QuarkusDev.java:564)
        at io.quarkus.gradle.tasks.QuarkusDev.newLauncher(QuarkusDev.java:299)
        at io.quarkus.gradle.tasks.QuarkusDev.startDev(QuarkusDev.java:192)
        ... 122 more
```
I've reproduced the issue in a simple hello async project that looks like
```
│   build.gradle.kts
│   gradlew
│   gradlew.bat
│   settings.gradle.kts
│
├───buildSrc
│   │   build.gradle.kts
│   │   settings.gradle.kts
│   │
│   └───src
│       └───main
│           └───kotlin
│                   quarkus-reactive-service.gradle.kts
│
├───gradle
│   └───wrapper
│           gradle-wrapper.jar
│           gradle-wrapper.properties
│
└───src
    └───main
        └───java
            └───org
                └───acme
                    └───getting
                        └───started
                            └───async
                                    GreetingResource.java
                                    GreetingService.java
```


### Expected behavior

```
> Task :quarkusGenerateCode
preparing quarkus application

> Task :quarkusGenerateCodeTests
preparing quarkus application

> Task :quarkusDev
Listening for transport dt_socket at address: 5005
Press [h] for more options>NG [29s]
__  ____  __  _____   ___  __ ____  ______
 --/ __ \/ / / / _ | / _ \/ //_/ / / / __/
 -/ /_/ / /_/ / __ |/ , _/ ,< / /_/ /\ \
--\___\_\____/_/ |_/_/|_/_/|_|\____/___/
2021-10-04 13:46:55,007 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) failed-dev-mode unspecified on JVM (powered by Quarkus 2.3.0.CR1) started in 6.240s. Listening on: http://localhost:8080
2021-10-04 13:46:55,012 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Profile dev activated. Live Coding activated.
2021-10-04 13:46:55,012 INFO  [io.quarkus] (Quarkus Main Thread) Installed features: [cdi, resteasy-reactive, resteasy-reactive-jackson, smallrye-context-propagation, vertx]
```

### Actual behavior

```
> .\gradlew --stacktrace quarkusDev

> Task :quarkusGenerateCode
preparing quarkus application

> Task :quarkusGenerateCodeTests
preparing quarkus application

> Task :quarkusDev FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':quarkusDev'.
> Failed to run

* Try:
Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':quarkusDev'.
```

### How to Reproduce?

[failed-dev-mode.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/7281336/failed-dev-mode.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10 version 20H2 (19042.1237)

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk 11.0.12 2021-07-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-11.0.12+7 (build 11.0.12+7, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.3.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.2  Build time:   2021-08-17 09:59:03 UTC Revision:     a773786b58bb28710e3dc96c4d1a7063628952ad  Kotlin:       1.5.21 Groovy:       3.0.8 Ant:          Apache Ant(TM) version 1.10.9 compiled on September 27 2020 JVM:          11.0.12 (Eclipse Foundation 11.0.12+7) OS:           Windows 10 10.0 amd64

### Additional information

The project's `build.gradle.kts` is just
```
plugins {
  id("quarkus-reactive-service")
}
```
I can make the `quarkusDev` mode start by changing it to (note that the started Quarkus instance will show version **2.3.0.CR1** even with an outdated quarkus reference in the build script)
```
plugins {
  id("quarkus-reactive-service")
}
buildscript {
  repositories {
    gradlePluginPortal()
  }
  dependencies {
    classpath("io.quarkus:io.quarkus.gradle.plugin:2.2.3.Final")
  }
}
```
